title: unesco_heritage_Ancient_City_of_Bosra
text:
Name: Ancient City of Bosra. short_description:

Bosra, once the capital of the Roman province of Arabia, was an important stopover on the ancient caravan route to Mecca. A magnificent 2nd-century Roman theatre, early Christian ruins and several mosques are found within its great walls.

. date_inscribed: 1980. danger: 1. date_end: . longitude: 36.48167. latitude: 32.51806. area_hectares: 116.2. category_long: Cultural. category_short: C. Country name: Syrian Arab Republic. Region: Arab States. iso_code: sy. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
